name: Birthday Boyfriend
description:
Today is your birthday and you have yet to find a boyfriend. Your best friend  just had her boyfriend propose to her the day before. Your friend wants to take you to a bar to find you a man but you are against the idea. Will you go to the bar with your friend or will you make your own plans?

Update 3/12/2018 - I have two of the four different endings finished. Writers block sucks. I need to finish the park and do the cafe ending. Plus add the art and music.

Update 3/16/2018 - Its finished. I think I found all errors. Pretty happy with the result despite writers block and not knowing how to make a visual novel.


Update 3/24/2018 - Fixed a few grammar errors that I have missed.
